intent_atoms.description: VoiceOver regression pass must confirm focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware.
Real-World Assets task requires securing Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC-4 and MPEG-H fixtures before regression baselines can shift from synthetic payloads.
Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance must export metrics alongside parse trees with refreshed JSON snapshots and maintain CLI fixture assertions.
Future schema updates will use ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS=1 swift test --filter JSONExportSnapshotTests to regenerate snapshots.
Surface ParseIssueStore metrics in SwiftUI ribbons once tolerant parsing UI specs are finalized.

functional_units.name: VoiceOver Regression Pass for Accessibility Shortcuts
functional_units.description: Verify that focus command menus announce controls and restore focus targets on macOS and iPadOS hardware

functional_units.name: Real-World Assets Licensing
functional_units.description: Secure licensing approvals for Dolby Vision, AV1, VP9, Dolby AC‑4, and MPEG‑H fixtures to enable regression baselines with real-world media

functional_units.name: Snapshot & CLI Fixture Maintenance
functional_units.description: Export metrics alongside parse trees in refreshed JSON snapshots and maintain CLI fixture assertions using ISOINSPECTOR_REGENERATE_SNAPSHOTS environment variable

functional_units.name: Tolerant Parsing Metrics UI
functional_units.description: Display ParseIssueStore metrics in SwiftUI ribbons once tolerant parsing UI specifications are finalized
